body: Took my #drone out for a flight over the city! Here’s the #aerialfootage I captured. Let me know what you think! #dronephotography #cityscape

comments.body: Wow, those shots are incredible! The city looks amazing from that height. How long have you been flying drones?
@45454 Thanks! I’ve been flying for about six months now. Still learning, but it’s so much fun!
This is awesome! Did you edit the footage yourself? It looks really professional.
@56565 Yeah, I used some basic editing software to clean it up and add a few transitions. Glad you liked it!
The sunset looks amazing from that angle! Do you have a favorite spot to fly?
@67676 The sunset was my favorite part too! I love flying near the waterfront—there’s always something interesting to capture.
I’ve been thinking about getting a drone! Any recommendations for a beginner?
@78787 Definitely start with something affordable and easy to fly. I started with a DJI Mini—it’s perfect for learning the basics.
This is stunning! How high can your drone fly? The perspective is unreal!
@89898 Thanks! It can go up to about 400 feet, which gives you an amazing view but still stays within legal limits.
